thread.title: Projected Royals-Astros lineups for Game 1 of ALDS
thread.title_full: Projected Royals-Astros lineups for Game 1 of ALDS

author: Jeff Deters
title: Projected Royals-Astros lineups for Game 1 of ALDS
text:
Projected Royals-Astros lineups for Game 1 of ALDS Escobar to hit leadoff for KC Posted: October 7, 2015 - 10:52am By Jeff Deters jeff.deters@cjonline.com 
Hereâ€™s a look at the projected lineups for Game 1 of the American League Division Series between the Houston Astros and Kansas City Royals. First pitch is 6:37 p.m. Thursday at Kauffman Stadium in Kansas City, Mo. 
HOUSTON ASTROS 
P Player Avg. HR RBIs 
2B Jose Altuve .313 15 66 
RF George Springer .276 16 41 
SS Carlos Correa .279 22 68 
LF Colby Rasmus .238 25 61 
DH Evan Gattis .246 27 88 
CF Carlos Gomez .255 12 56 
3B Luis Valbuena .224 25 56 
1B Chris Carter .199 24 64 
C Jason Castro .211 11 31 
KANSAS CITY ROYALS 
P Player Avg. HR RBIs 
SS Alcides Escobar .257 3 47 
2B Ben Zobrist .276 13 56 
CF Lorenzo Cain .307 16 72 
1B Eric Hosmer .297 18 93 
DH Kendrys Morales .290 22 106 
3B Mike Moustakas .284 22 82 
C Salvador Perez .260 21 70 
LF Alex Gordon .271 13 48 
RF Alex Rios .255 4 32 
STARTING PITCHERS 
Astros: RHP Collin McHugh (19-7, 3.89 ERA) 
Royals: RHP Yordano Ventura (13-8, 4.08 ERA) 
Statistics are from the 2015 regular season 
Jeff Deters can be reached at jeff.deters@cjonline.com .
